PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryDiagonalTrussConnector
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Shape properties specific to connecting accessories in truss form with diagonal cross-bars.

PropertyDef.Name: DiagonalTrussHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The overall height of the truss connector.

PropertyDef.Name: DiagonalTrussLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The overall length of the truss connector.

PropertyDef.Name: DiagonalTrussCrossBarSpacing
PropertyDef.Definition: The spacing between diagonal cross-bar sections.

PropertyDef.Name: DiagonalTrussBaseBarDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the base bar.

PropertyDef.Name: DiagonalTrussSecondaryBarDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the secondary bar.

PropertyDef.Name: DiagonalTrussCrossBarDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the diagonal cross-bars.
